Text: I can't get this to work, I have 2 other PSX games i downloaded from here on my XBOX and they both work fine but this one wont work. It either freezes while it says "Loading..." or it says it can;t load. I noticed this is another type of file then the others(ones a ISO/.img and the others a .bin) is there anyway to convert this to one of those types? i tried ISOCraxtion but i cant get it to work
and the trial version of MagicISO wont let you burn anything over 300MB and I'm not paying for the complete program just to burn this game
this is a strange thing i have waited many times it doesn't starts:S can you plz fix it??!!
Will this work on a PS one ??

This works on a PSX emulator on your PC. I'm not sure but I think you could also burn it to CD and use it in your PS1/2/3. 

Simply load the image on your PSX emulator. 

I am getting freezing after about 5-10 minutes of play but I think this might be due to the emulator and not the game.

Thanks for the upload!
